mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gsivr.ax_ivr_dnis (dnis, dnis_name, dnis_group, dnis_group_eng, dnis_media, dnis_useyn, comp_cd, crt_dt, crt_by) VALUES (#{dnis}, #{dnis_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dnis_group, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dnis_group_eng, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dnis_media, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dnis_useyn}, #{comp_cd}, #{crt_dt}, #{crt_by})
mapper.update: UPDATE gsivr.ax_ivr_dnis SET dnis_useyn = #{dnis_useyn}, dnis_name = #{dnis_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dnis_group = #{dnis_group, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dnis_group_eng = #{dnis_group_eng, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dnis_media = #{dnis_media, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, upt_dt = #{upt_dt}, upt_by = #{upt_by} WHERE dnis = #{dnis}
